title: Cannot use the assistant to make calls when screen is locked
content:
I tried to use the assistant to make a phone call. In my car, "Hey Google call xxxx". Sorry I cannot do that as the screen is locked.
Smart lock is on and my car is shown as trusted location (connection via Bluetooth).

I used to do this no problem, not sure if it's an android 10 issue
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3a
